title: Acid–base reaction-based dispersive solid phase extraction of favipiravir using biotin from biological samples prior to capillary electrophoresis analysis
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19612-19618
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA07356D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Elnaz Safari, Behrouz Seyfinejad, Mir Ali Farajzadeh, Mohammad Reza Afshar Mogaddam, Mahboob Nemati
An acid–base reaction-based dispersive solid-phase extraction method was developed for the extraction of favipiravir from deionized water, plasma and urine samples prior to its determination using a capillary electrophoresis-diode array detector.
